    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_100749</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_100749</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Short circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurzschluß</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Court circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curto-circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cortocircuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομο κύκλωμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cortocircuito</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that connecting a piece of wire from one end of a cell to the other creates a short circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">battery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">short circuit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß dem das 
Anschließen eines Stückes Leitung von einem Ende einer Zelle an das 
andere einen Kurzschluß erstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre que cela relier un 
morceau de fil d'une extrémité d'une cellule à l'autre crée un 
court circuit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que isso conectar uma 
parte de fio de uma extremidade de uma pilha à outra cría um 
curto-circuito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra che quello collegare 
una parte di legare da un'estremità di una cellula all'altra crea un 
cortocircuito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η σύνδεση ενός 
κομματιού του καλωδίου από ένα τέλος ενός κυττάρου με άλλο 
δημιουργεί ένα σύντομο κύκλωμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que eso conectar un 
pedazo de alambre a partir de un extremo de una célula con el otro 
crea un cortocircuito.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Batterie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schaltplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
